description: Metrics on downstream traffic from/to clients.

panels.description: Total number of downstream requests processed by Airlock Microgateway.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Percentage of 4xx and 5xx downstream requests. This includes requests blocked by Airlock Microgateway.

targets.expr:
sum (increase(envoy_http_downstream_rq_xx{envoy_response_code_class=~"[45]", envoy_http_conn_manager_prefix="http",managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}"}[$__range]))/
sum (increase(envoy_http_downstream_rq_total{envoy_http_conn_manager_prefix="http",managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Request Error Rate

panels.description: Number of downstream requests with a 1xx response code processed by Airlock Microgateway.
panels.title: 1xx Requests

panels.description: Number of downstream requests with a 2xx response code processed by Airlock Microgateway.
panels.title: 2xx Requests

panels.description: Number of downstream requests with a 3xx response code processed by Airlock Microgateway.
panels.title: 3xx Requests

panels.description:
Number of downstream requests with a 4xx response code processed by Airlock Microgateway.
This includes requests blocked by Airlock Microgateway.
panels.title: 4xx Requests

panels.description: Number of downstream requests with a 5xx response code processed by Airlock Microgateway.
panels.title: 5xx Requests

panels.description: Total downstream requests per second processed by Airlock Microgateway along with the observed error rate. The error rate includes requests blocked by Airlock Microgateway.

targets.expr:
sum (rate(envoy_http_downstream_rq_xx{envoy_response_code_class=~"[45]", envoy_http_conn_manager_prefix="http",managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}"}[1m]) or on() vector(0))/
sum (rate(envoy_http_downstream_rq_total{envoy_http_conn_manager_prefix="http",managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}"}[1m]))

panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Percentiles of the application downstream latency over one minute.
panels.title: Request duration

panels.description: Downstream requests per second with a 1xx response code.
panels.title: 1xx Requests

panels.title: 2xx Requests

panels.title: 4xx Requests

panels.description: Downstream requests per second with a 5xx response code.
panels.title: 5xx Requests

panels.description: Number of connections from downstream clients.
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: Total amount of data received by Airlock Microgateway from downstream clients.
panels.title: Data received

panels.description: Total amount of data sent to downstream clients.
panels.title: Data sent

panels.description: Connections per second from downstream clients.
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: Histogram on the duration of connections from downstream clients.
panels.title: Connection Length

panels.description: Rate of traffic received from downstream clients.
panels.title: Data received

panels.description: Rate of traffic sent to downstream clients.
panels.title: Data sent

list.description: Allows filtering on the gateway kind.
list.label: Gateway Kind
list.name: gateway_kind

list.description: Allows filtering on the managing operator instance.
list.label: Microgateway Operator
list.name: operator

list.description: Allows filtering on the namespaces in which gateways are deployed.
list.label: Gateway Namespace
list.name: namespace

list.description: Allows filtering on specific gateway instance names within the selected namespaces.
list.label: Gateway Name
list.name: gateway_name

title: Airlock Microgateway Downstream - Metrics
